Summary: A picture i took at a friends house
divs: sighting detailsi was at my friends house playing video games. we decided to go for a walk. beside his house is a steep hill\mountain thing into the woods. it lead to a large field like clearing.we climbed all the way up and walked a ways into the field. his girlfriend called his phone and he answered. while waiting on him i took out my camera and began taking pictures of the field and woods and stuff. i just took some random shots not really paying no attention or anything. i then later on posted the pictures on facebook. a friend of mine then drew my attention to something in the top right hand corner up in the sky. it looked like something we couldnt explain. i was completely startled by this. because at the time there was no noice in the field other than my friend on the phone and i hadnt noticed it before i was shocked by this being int the photo. my friend thought it might be some sort of bug just flew up but i think its something more like a ufo.
